head.title: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: saxon:octets-to-hexBinary()

meta.name: title
meta.content: Saxonica: XSLT and XQuery Processing: saxon:octets-to-hexBinary()

body.p: This function takes a sequence of integers as input, and treats them as octets. The integers must therefore all be in the range 0-255. The result of the function is the xs:hexBinary value representing this sequence of octets.
